scheme_name: Total Alkali vs Silica (TAS) Series Classification
author: Sefy Levy
description: Distinguish between Alkaline and Subalkaline volcanic series based on total alkalis (Na2O+K2O) and Silica (SiO2)
reference: Irvine, T. N., & Baragar, W. R. A. (1971). A guide to the chemical classification of the common volcanic rocks.

classifications.name: ALKALINE SERIES
classifications.description: Rocks plotting above the Irvine & Baragar dividing line; enriched in Na2O+K2O relative to SiO2

classifications.name: SUBALKALINE SERIES
classifications.description: Rocks plotting below the dividing line; includes Tholeiitic and Calc-Alkaline suites

classifications.name: INSUFFICIENT DATA
classifications.description: Missing key oxide values (SiO2, Na2O, or K2O)
